wf_workflow_version.description: If you want to do in-place editing/debugging trial/error kind of stuff to test out workflow concepts .. you must choose the Global Table. Only choosing this table is possible. All other tables will force you to save the workflow, then execute the workflow, then view the results via the Context View. Note: the 'Global Table' is a base level Table and therefore has very few fields in it.
wf_workflow_version.name: RADT Demo Workflow - InplaceEditing - OnlyPossibleWith - Global Table
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

workflow.display_value: RADT Demo Workflow - InplaceEditing - OnlyPossibleWith - Global Table

wf_condition.name: Blue
wf_condition.short_description: We can add multiple output possibilites by right click and selecting 'add condition'

wf_condition.name: Green
wf_condition.short_description: Another right click on the If Widgit and 'Add Condition' to get a 3rd possible outcome

wf_condition.name: Red
wf_condition.short_description: We Can Rename the 'Yes' to 'Red' and Change Conditional Check to be our Custom ScatchPad variable.
